newsitem.title: UK: National Power slips on Kleinwort downgrade.
newsitem.headline: National Power slips on Kleinwort downgrade.

text.p: Shares in UK electricity generator National Power Plc eased on Thursday after Kleinwort Benson downgraded its recommendation on the stock to "sell" from "hold", traders said.
The change of stance comes after analysis of the electricity market post 1998 when it opens up to competition.
"Kleinwort's view is that National Power probably won't be able to sustain the dividend growth rate previously thought," said a market source.
By early afternoon the shares had slipped 7-1/2p to 386p.
Kleinwort Benson analysts were not immediately available to comment.
